programme.desc: A troubled security guard begins working at Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria. While spending his first night on the job, he realizes the late shift at Freddy's won't be so easy to make it through.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Mercer is trying to rebuild his life and his relationship with his son amid the turbulent Los Angeles riots in 1992. Across town, another father and son put their own strained relationship to the test as they plan a risky heist where Mercer works.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: After losing his brother in combat, Jacob Singer returns home from Afghanistan -- only to be pulled into a mind-twisting state of paranoia. Singer soon realizes that his sibling is alive but life is not what it seems.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: An oddball group of cops, criminals, tourists and teens converges in a Georgia forest after a 500-pound black bear ingests a large amount of cocaine and goes on a drug-fueled rampage.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: When an unspeakable evil takes over the world, the only protection for a mother and her twin sons is their house and strong bond. Needing to stay connected at all times, they tether themselves with ropes, clinging to one another and never letting go.

programme.title: Movie

programme.desc: Della Reese, a political campaigner, asks Fred for permission to use his home as campaign headquarters, even though Fred and Lamont support a different candidate.

programme.title: Sanford & Son

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The team faces difficult reminders of a past school shooting when they receive a warning that a copycat plans to re-enact the crime; as the team races to stop the new threat, they flash back to the day of the tense first mission.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Jessica and Chris go under cover in Mexico to save a Mexican federal agent who has been kidnapped by a drug-dealing gang that Jessica helped bring to justice; Hondo's mother worries about him when he engages in renovation projects in her home.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The team races to find a militant group that escaped capture months earlier; now, the criminals take hostages in exchange for a $500 million ransom from corporations they deem corrupt; Hondo's emotional turmoil begins to affect his leadership.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A cosmetics tycoon (Lucie Arnaz) is involved in controversial stock transactions, scandalous affairs and hormone-replacement therapy.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A media-savvy attorney (Gregory Hines) defends a black teenager accused of shooting an off-duty police officer.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives investigating a cabdriver's death discover his last fare was a gifted writer with a violent streak.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a woman's body turns up in the East River, the detectives discover she recently had attended a professional football player's birthday party.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The lead suspect in the murder of a Manhattan executive claims his knowledge of the crime came from a psychic vision.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Investigators identify multiple suspects in the murder of the admissions director at an ultra-elite private school, including its headmaster (guest star Roger Rees).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The corpse of a Russian model shows many old injuries, convincing the detectives that she had been the victim of abuse.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A sniper shoots four people at random in Manhattan and causes a citywide panic; Jack and Serena uncover a shocking truth behind the shootings.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives follow a string of mysterious homicides; a woman runs over her unfaithful husband; a murdered woman has an uncertain relationship to her brothers.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A comic's infant son dies after being dropped from a high-rise window, leading detectives to a dark secret.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives stumble upon a serial killer while investigating the rape and murder of a teenage girl.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A bounty hunter turns up dead while trailing a fugitive rapist and bookstore heir.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A carjacking involving SARS forces detectives to search for the initial patient infected to prevent an outbreak.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives link the murder of an actress to a member of her therapy group, then focus their attention on a Tony-winning songwriter.

programme.desc: Mayberry's small-town methods prove more effective in capturing a fugitive than those of the state police.

programme.desc: Opie signs up for a race to win a medal, but he loses and learns an important lesson in good sportsmanship instead.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy's diplomacy and modern engineering techniques are required to upgrade the music of the town choir.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: To celebrate Founder's Day, Andy and Barney decide to choose a stranger at random to be Mayberry's Guest of Honor. Unbeknownst to them, the person they have chosen turns out to be a pickpocket.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy uses his wits to help a struggling salesman, despite strong pressure to put him out of business.

programme.desc: With the courthouse full of moonshiners, Otis has to serve his jail time for public intoxication at the Taylor house under the supervision of Aunt Bee.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney exert all their efforts to convince local farmer Rafe Hollister to take his tetanus shot when he refuses.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.sub-title: Andy and Barney in the Big City
programme.desc: Andy and Barney travel to Raleigh on a business trip and get involved in the capture of a jewel thief in their hotel.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A misunderstanding leads Andy and Aunt Bee to believe that they are both anxious to get married.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney interferes with Andy's attempts to romance Mayberry's County Nurse, Mary Simpson; when Andy suggests to Barney that he and Mary need some alone time, Barney immediately thinks that they are getting married.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Floyd hires a second barber, Medwin, when his barbershop gets too hectic. The shop flourishes, but Andy becomes suspicious when he sees the same men going into the shop every day.

programme.desc: Our deadly leprechaun is in space to woo a beautiful princess who is impressed with his gold and desires to separate him from it.

programme.title: Movie
